title: sadhanandhamE
sahitya:
sadAnadamE tarum kanda vEL pAdAravindamE bhaji manamE



anupallavi



kathAnanda mAkanda kaDal amudAm tanaiyE ArAyundorumE



caraNam



vAcAmagOcari gauri vANi tE cAmrumEni mEcakalyANi AcAra shIli abhirAmi
aranAriDam priyA shivakAmi
aruL bAlanE aDiyArkku aruL abhayakara SaNmukha  vElanE varakavi kunjaradAsa
paripAlAvena mAlAghiyE
